allTimeLow.title: All Time Low
allTimeLow.details: The lowest price a cryptocurrency has traded at since its inception.

allTimeHigh.title: All Time High
allTimeHigh.details: The highest price a cryptocurrency has traded at since its inception.

circulatingSupply.title: Circulating Supply
circulatingSupply.details: The number of coins or tokens that are actively available in the market and in the general public's hands.

fullyDilutedValuation.title: Fully Diluted Valuation
fullyDilutedValuation.details: The market cap if the max supply was in circulation, calculated by multiplying the current price by the max supply.

marketCap.title: Market Cap
marketCap.details: The total market value of a cryptocurrency, calculated by multiplying the current price by the circulating supply.

maxSupply.title: Max Supply
maxSupply.details: The maximum number of coins or tokens that will ever exist for a cryptocurrency, as defined by the project's protocol.

tokenContractWarning.header: You just copied a token contract address
tokenContractWarning.description: {boldDescription} It is NOT your address for receiving funds. It is the smart contract address used to identify the token on the blockchain.
tokenContractWarning.boldDescription: Never send funds to the address you copied.

totalSupply.title: Total Supply
totalSupply.details: The number of coins or tokens that currently exist, including those that may be locked, reserved, or not yet released.

volume24h.title: 24h Volume
volume24h.details: The total value of a cryptocurrency traded in the last 24 hours across all exchanges.

allNetworks.heading: No NFTs yet in this wallet
allNetworks.subheading: Your wallet contains 0 NFTs on all of the supported networks

selectedNetworks.heading: No NFTs on selected network(s)

ens.description: Ethereum Name Service (ENS) domains are secure domains names for the decentralized world. ENS domains provide a way for user to map human readable names to blockchain and non-blockchain resources, like Ethereum addresses, IPFS hashes, or website URLs. ENS domains can be bought and sold on secondary markets.

failedMedia.title: Media couldn’t be loaded
failedMedia.desc: Media type may not yet be supported.

onboarding.import_error: The wallet could not be imported

onboarding_backup_prompt.title: Back up
onboarding_backup_prompt.subtitle: your wallet
onboarding_backup_prompt.caption:
You need your {recoveryPhrase} to recover your crypto if you lose your device or switch to another wallet.
{neverShare}

skipWarning.title: Continue without backing up your wallet?
skipWarning.checkOne: I understand that if I lose my phone or delete the app without backing up, I won't have any way to recover my wallet.
skipWarning.checkTwo: I understand that I'm solely responsible for any loss of assets resulting as a result of not having a recovery backup.

onboarding_backup.title: Your secret recovery phrase
onboarding_backup.caption:
Write down these 12 words in numerical order and keep them in a secure place.
{neverShare}

onboarding_secure_wallet.title: Secure

onboarding_secure_wallet.caption: Use {authType} to prevent someone with your phone from accessing your crypto.

onboardingBackupVerify.title: Verify you saved it correctly
onboardingBackupVerify.caption: Tap the words below in the correct numerical order to verify you saved your secret recovery phrase.

pasteWarning.title: Confirm you saved it somewhere safe
pasteWarning.checkOne: I understand that if I lose my phone or delete the app, I will need the secret recovery phrase to restore my wallet.
pasteWarning.checkTwo: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I'm solely responsible for any loss of assets.

methodManual.title: Enter seed phrase

selection.title: Select the wallet backup you want to import

onboardingImportWallet.caption: Enter your secret recovery phrase to import your wallet.
onboardingImportWallet.disclaimer: If anyone else knows this Secret Recovery Phrase (seed words), they also have access to this wallet and the funds are not safe.

importSubWalletsSuccess.subtitleOneWallet: Wallet successfully added. You can add more at any time.

firstPage.title: More than just crypto storage!
firstPage.description: With your wallet, you can {boldDescription} using WalletConnect.
firstPage.boldDescription: safely access thousands of decentralized apps

secondPage.titleWithEllipsis: To connect your wallet with Web3 apps...
secondPage.title: To connect your wallet with Web3 apps

thirdPage.title: When using Web3 apps on your phone

fourthPage.title: Try it out:
fourthPage.mintDescription: Use your wallet to claim Free NFTs on {url}
fourthPage.ensDescription: Register your on-chain name before it's gone
fourthPage.aaveDescription: Borrow and lend crypto on Aave

avaxLineaWelcoming.title: Avalanche & Linea support is Here!
avaxLineaWelcoming.part1: Your wallet now supports Avalanche, the highly scalable blockchain with blazing-fast finality, and Linea, the Ethereum L2 designed for secure, low-cost transactions.
avaxLineaWelcoming.part2: With these new integrations, you can view asset balances, broadcast transactions, collect NFTs, monitor defi positions and connect to dapps on both of the networks.

browserExploreWelcome.title: Explore the onchain world
browserExploreWelcome.body: Take the next step in your crypto journey today. You can now discover and connect to decentralized apps (dapps) without leaving your Kraken Wallet.
browserExploreWelcome.part1: Use the new menu options at the bottom of your screen to access the Explore page
browserExploreWelcome.part2: Explore popular dapps and new onchain opportunties, or use the Search bar for more
browserExploreWelcome.part3: Easily connect to dapps and perform transactions without ever leaving the Kraken Wallet app

onboardingOutro.title: Your wallet is ready
onboardingOutro.caption: This wallet supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Polygon, Solana, and more.
onboardingOutro.footer: By continuing you agree to Kraken Wallet’s

onChainSecurity.appSafetyNotVerifiedMessage:
We were unable to verify the safety of the app that you are trying to connect to due to a temporary error or outage of our app verification service.
Proceed with caution.
onChainSecurity.domainMatchInfo: The domain linked to this request has been verified as this application's domain.
onChainSecurity.domainMismatchInfo: This website has a domain that does not match the sender of this request. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.domainMismatchMessage: The application's domain doesn't match the sender of this request. Approving may lead to loss of funds.
onChainSecurity.knownSecurityRiskInfo: This website is flagged as unsafe by multiple security providers. To protect your assets, do NOT connect to it.
onChainSecurity.knownSecurityRiskMessage: This website is flagged as unsafe by multiple security providers. Leave immediately to protect your assets from being drained
onChainSecurity.punycodeDomainRiskMessage: This website's address contains non-standard characters. This is a common technique used by scammers to impersonate legitimate websites. For your safety, it's recommended that you do not enter sensitive information or proceed with this website.
onChainSecurity.signTransactionCriticalWarning: We believe this transaction is malicious and unsafe to sign. Approving may lead to loss of funds.

passwordProtection.title: Password protection
passwordProtection.whatIsDescription: It adds extra security by requiring a password to allow the following actions:
passwordProtection.passwordSupersedesAppLockDescription: If you create a password, it will be required to make transactions, {biometricDescription}. For security both will be required.
passwordProtection.biometricDescriptionIOS: even if you’ve setup FaceID, or TouchID via App Lock
passwordProtection.biometricDescriptionAndroid: even if you’ve setup Biometrics via App Lock
passwordProtection.resetHintModalDesc: To adjust password options, you’ll need to disable password protection, and re-enable it again with the added change.
passwordProtection.passwordHintLetters: Try using upper and lowercase letters
passwordProtection.requireOnOpen: Require each time you open app?
passwordProtection.requireOnOpenDesc: Adds security by double-encrypting your app data, but you’ll need to enter the password each app open
passwordProtection.warningDescription: Store your password in a secure place. It is encrypted locally on your device, so it cannot be retrieved by Kraken if lost or forgotten.
passwordProtection.protectYourData: Protect your data with extra encryption
passwordProtection.disablePasswordDescription: Enter password to turn-off password protection
passwordProtection.lockout: Too many failed attempts, try again later
passwordProtection.wrongPasswordDescription: Check your password and try again
passwordProtection.walletLockedDescription: Enter your password to unlock it
passwordProtection.rationaleSignTransaction: Your password is required to sign transactions
passwordProtection.rationaleCreateWallet: Your password is required to create a new wallet
passwordProtection.rationaleSeeRecoveryPhrase: to view your Secret Recovery Phrase
passwordProtection.rationaleGetXPub: Your password is required to see your extended public key
passwordProtection.rationaleUpdateStorage: Your password is required to update the storage
passwordProtection.authFailedDescription: You can try again, or you may completely wipe and reset the app
passwordProtection.dataLoss1: I understand that reseting the app will completely restore it to a fresh install state.
passwordProtection.dataLoss2: I understand that after the app is restored, I will need my secret recovery phrase(s) to access my wallet(s).
passwordProtection.dataLoss3: I understand that if I reset the app and don’t have my wallet secret recovery phrase(s), it will be impossible to restore my wallet(s).
passwordProtection.dataLoss4: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase(s), I’m solely responsible for any loss of assets.

iCloudInfo.title: This will not delete your iCloud backup.
iCloudInfo.desc: So long as you have not manually deleted your backup, your wallet is recoverable.

receive.warning_nft: This is your {networkName} address. Use it to receive crypto and NFTs that are compatible on this network.
receive.addressError: The receiving address may not be up-to-date, please refresh and try again

universalSend.searchPlaceholder: Select what you want to send
universalSend.assetsEmptyDesc: Your current wallet does not have any assets, try funding your wallet
universalSend.assetBTCEmptyDesc: Your current wallet does not have any Bitcoin
universalSend.assetDogeEmptyDesc: Your current wallet does not have any Dogecoin
universalSend.assetSolanaEmptyDesc: Your current wallet does not have any available Solana assets
universalSend.assetEthereumaEmptyDesc: Your wallet does not have any available assets on Ethereum or Layer 2 networks

universalReceive.ethereumExplainerBody: Ethereum's address system extends to Ethereum compatible networks like Polygon, Arbitrum, OP Mainnet, Base, Blast, Linea and Avalanche ensuring your one address works everywhere

swap.title: Swap

error.insufficientGas: Insufficient {symbol} balance to cover swap transactions

emptyState.targetAssetEmptyTitle: No assets available to swap for
emptyState.targetAssetEmptyDesc: None of our providers support swaps for the asset you selected
emptyState.swappableAssetsEmptyNetworkTitle: No swappable assets available on selected network
emptyState.assetsEmptyDesc: Your current wallet does not have any assets, try funding your wallet
emptyState.swappableAssetsEmptyDesc: This wallet does not have any assets supported by our swap providers. Only Ethereum and EVM compatible networks are currently supported.
emptyState.swappableAssetsEmptyNetworkDesc: Your current wallet does not have any assets on selected network that are supported by our swap providers

swap.unsupportedAssetsHidden: Our swap providers do not yet support {count} of your other asset(s)

unsupportedRoute.title: There are no available routes for the transaction you entered. Increasing the slippage setting can give you more routes.
unsupportedRoute.desc: You can also try swapping for a major token first, then swap that for the desired asset.

priceImpact.title: Price impact
priceImpact.hint: Price impact is the difference between the market price and the swap price. It's dependent on the size of your trade relative to the liquidity in the pool.

minumumOutput.title: Minimum output
minumumOutput.hint: If slippage occurs, this is the minimum amount of the target asset you will receive when the transaction succeeds.

slippage.title: Swap slippage
slippage.hint: Swap slippage is the difference between the expected and final asset price. If the price changes beyond the set slippage tolerance, the transaction is canceled. Swap slippage applies only to same-chain swaps, excluding bridge slippage.

krakenFee.title: Kraken fee
krakenFee.hint: Kraken Wallet does not charge any fees for swaps. We offer this service for free to support the adoption of crypto and blockchain technology.

networkFee.title: Network fee
networkFee.hint: A network fee is a charge paid to blockchain validators for processing and confirming your transaction.

bridgeCost.title: Bridge cost
bridgeCost.hint: A bridge cost is a fee charged by the swap provider for transferring assets between different blockchains during the swap.

slippageSettings.title: Slippage settings
slippageSettings.desc: If the price changes unfavorably by more than the slippage percentage, your swap transaction will be canceled.
slippageSettings.footer: Higher slippage may help with transaction success rate, but may expose you to frontrunning / sandwich attacks.
slippageSettings.warningSmall: Slippage below {amount}% can cause swap to fail
slippageSettings.warningUnsupported: Slippage greater than {amount}% is not supported

scan.instructions: Connect to dapps by scanning a QR code
scan.missingPermission: To use the camera go to your phone settings and activate your camera permissions for the Super Wallet app
scan.wallet_connect_failed: The QR code did not scan, please try again
scan.wallet_connect_invalid_qr_code: This is an invalid QR code

send.eip681Warning: Warning: QR scan includes transfer instructions. Confirm the recipient address before proceeding.

networkWarning.alertBody: Make sure that the person you're sending to has a wallet that supports {networkName}

suspiciousCharWarning.title: Attention:
suspiciousCharWarning.desc: This address contains non-ASCII characters. Please be aware that there are characters that look identical or very similar to English letters.

send.feeWarning: Current Network Fee is {feeAmount} which is more than {percentage}% of what you are sending.

storeReview.alertTitle: Are you enjoying the Kraken Wallet App?
storeReview.alertMessage: We’d love to know if you’re having a great experience.
storeReview.nagativeAlertTitle: We’re sorry you’re not having a good time with this app.
storeReview.negativeAlertMessage: Would you like to let us know how we can improve your experience?

support.knowledgeBaseDesc: Search our docs, read our FAQs and get in touch

transactionDetails.notesCaption: Descriptions are saved locally on your device

list.title: Connected apps
list.instructions: Scan QR codes to connect apps with WalletConnect

app_details.disconnect_decscription: Disconnecting this app will remove all access to your wallet

advancedAccountInfo.ethereumDerivationPathContent: Ethereum's derivation path is shared with Ethereum compatible networks like Polygon, Arbitrum, OP Mainnet, Base, Linea and Avalanche meaning the same derivation path is used for all of them.
advancedAccountInfo.title: {walletName} - info

extendedPublicKey.summary: This is your {summaryEmphasis}, it is the master public key that was used to generate all of the public bitcoin addresses for this wallet.

tokenLists.description: Token Lists are reputation based lists aimed at identifying tokens that are trusted by various exchanges and other Web3 participants.
tokenLists.likelySpamDescription: Use extreme caution when interacting this token. It could be harmful.
tokenLists.likelySpamInfo: Likely spam tokens have been flagged by public communities or one of our partners as being spam, fraudulent or harmful.
tokenLists.unverifiedDescription: This token is not listed on any of the supported Token Lists. Use caution.
tokenLists.unverifiedExplainerDescription: Tokens that are not listed by one of our supported project lists and have not been flagged for spam will be found on this list.
tokenLists.verifiedInfoKraken: Tokens listed here are currently available on the Kraken exchange.

walletBackup.backupYourWalletDescription: Make sure you can recover your crypto if you lose your device or switch to another wallet.

cloudWarning.title: Cloud backup recommended
cloudWarning.desc: Ensure you can recover your wallet even if you lose your secret recovery phrase

manualWarning.title: Manual backup recommended
manualWarning.desc: Ensure you can recover your wallet even if you lose your iCloud account access.

secondaryBackup.title: Create a secondary backup
secondaryBackup.iCloud: For enhanced recoverability, create a password-encrypted backup on iCloud. Encryption means not even Apple can see it
secondaryBackup.manual: For enhanced recoverability, create a manual backup of you secret recovery phrase to keep it in a secure place

walletBackupPrompt.body: You haven't backed up your Secret Recovery Phrase. We recommend backing up to avoid losing access to your funds.
walletBackupPrompt.header: Before receiving funds in this wallet, back it up

walletCloudBackup.passkeyDescription: To create your backup, encrypt it with a passkey. This ensures no-one but you can restore the backup. (Encryption ensures that even Apple can't see it)

hints.part2: Encrypted using biometrics or security device
hints.part3: Recoverable by you even if you lose this device

walletCloudBackup.success: Wallet successfully backed up on iCloud

walletCloudBackupDelete.title: Delete backup
walletCloudBackupDelete.header: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
walletCloudBackupDelete.caption: Make sure you have your Secret Recovery Phrase saved somewhere safe so that you can still recover your wallet in case you lose your device.
walletCloudBackupDelete.check1: I understand that if I lose my phone or delete the app, I will need the secret recovery phrase to restore my wallet.
walletCloudBackupDelete.check2: I confirm that I have saved my 12 word secret recovery phrase in a secure place.

noPasskeyFound.title: No passkey found
noPasskeyFound.descriptioniOS17: We couldn't find a passkey. It's possible you didn't create one or iCloud Keychain is disabled in settings.
noPasskeyFound.descriptioniOS18: We couldn't find a passkey. It's possible you didn't create one or Passwords is disabled in settings.

errorInactive.title: Inactive passkey
errorInactive.subtitle: This passkey is inactive, which means it is from a backup that you deleted manually.
errorInactive.description: If you have created multiple passkeys, you can try importing another backup. Otherwise, you can import your wallet using the 12-24 word Secret Recovery Phrase

errorDeletingPasskey.title: Error deleting passkey backup
errorDeletingPasskey.deletedPasskeyPossibility: Another possibility is that the passkey containing your backup was already deleted. If you're sure the passkey is deleted, we can mark it as so and remove it from the wallet.

deleteBackupConfirmation.title: Are you sure you want to remove this passkey backup?
deleteBackupConfirmation.description: By removing it, you are confirming that the passkey was already deleted. This action will remove any reference to the deleted passkey from the app.

errorCreatingBackup.title: Error creating backup
errorCreatingBackup.tryAgainFormatted: When trying again, keep in mind that we don't support saving backup on other devices.

userCanceledBackup.title: Passkey sign in required
userCanceledBackup.description: To backup your wallet, you must Sign In a second time, otherwise we can't securely encrypt your wallet using the passkey.

ios17.title: Make sure you are using iCloud Keychain to create the passkey. Other password managers are not yet supported.

one.title: Tip 1: Make sure iCloud Keychain is turned-on to be used for passwords and passkeys:

ios18.title: When you try again, make sure you are using iCloud Passwords to create the passkey. Other password managers are not yet supported.

one.title: Tip 1: Make sure Passwords is turned-on by following these steps:

supportHint.regular: If that doesn't resolve your issue, you can get help by visiting
supportHint.regularWithManualBackup: If that doesn't resolve your issue, you can import your 12-24 Secret Recovery Phrase or get help by visiting

walletBackupSelection.title: Back up
walletBackupSelection.subtitle: your wallet
walletBackupSelection.prompt: Make sure you can always access your wallet even if you lose your device.
walletBackupSelection.caption: If you don't backup your wallet, you put yourself at risk of losing your crypto. We have no access to your recovery phrase and can't help you recover it without a backup.
walletBackupSelection.iCloudDescLong: Encrypt with a passkey and store on iCloud
walletBackupSelection.manualBackupDescLong: Save by hand in a safe place of your choice
walletBackupSelection.manualBackupDescShort: Save in a safe place of your choice
walletBackupSelection.manualBackupDescShortCompleted: I've saved it in a safe place

tooltip.iCloud: An iCloud backup ensures you can still recover your wallet if you lose your secret recovery phrase.
tooltip.manual: A manual backup ensures you can still recover your wallet if you lose iCloud access or misplace your device.

explainer.title: Increase recoverability to reduce the chance of loss
explainer.desc: Losing a secret recovery phrase is a typical way people lose their crypto. Kraken Wallet minimizes this risk by offering more than one secure backup method.

swaps.title: Fast, Versatile Swaps at Your Fingertips
swaps.part1: Swap almost any of your assets for other popular tokens and crypto, using some of the most robust swap protocols onchain.  Whether swapping within a single network or seamlessly bridging across eight supported chains — most trades settle in just seconds!
swaps.part2: Experience fast, secure, and flexible token exchanges — right within your wallet.

errors.fetchBalance: Unable to retrieve the Kraken exchange balance.
errors.createAddress: Failed to create a funding address.
errors.getFee: Unable to fetch the exact fee amount.

availableBalanceInfo.title: A portion of your Kraken exchange holdings can be unavailable for withdrawal due to a temporary hold.

appLock.title: Secure your wallet before connecting
appLock.description: To protect your funds, turn on {authType} before connecting your exchange.

appLockWarning.title: Turn off App Lock?
appLockWarning.description: Disabling App Lock will turn off your connection to Kraken. You’ll need to set it up again if you want to transfer your funds seamlessly.

noData.title: No assets to transfer
noData.description: Your Kraken exchange account does not contain any assets to transfer.

unconnected.title: Get crypto in your wallet with Kraken
unconnected.body: Connect your Kraken exchange account to seamlessly transfer funds into your wallet
unconnected.alert: Only the current wallet: "{walletName}", will be connected to Kraken.

connected.alert: Only the current wallet: "{walletName}", has been connected to Kraken.
connected.feature0: Ability to Receive funds quickly by transferring from your Kraken account
connected.feature1: Track your onchain and Kraken exchange balances right from your wallet

stepsToConnect.heading: To connect to Kraken follow these steps:

transferCta.heading: Transfer from Kraken
transferCta.body: Connect your Kraken account to transfer crypto quickly

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.selectAssetDescription: Transfer from Kraken exchange to your wallet
transfer.unsupportedAssetsDescription: {assets} are not currently supported by Kraken Wallet

disconnectScreen.title: Disconnect from Kraken
disconnectScreen.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect this wallet from Kraken?
disconnectScreen.warningMessage: You will no longer retain functionality for seamless transfers between your wallet: “{walletName}”, and your Kraken exchange account.
disconnectScreen.alert: After you wallet is disconnected, the API key will remain valid in your Kraken exchange API settings for 6 months.

selectNetwork.title: Select network
selectNetwork.description: Choose on which network you want to receive your {assetLabel} in your wallet.
